name: The Greatest Flight Simulator of All Time
name_original: The Greatest Flight Simulator of All Time
description:
Your autopilot is broken, and you're now left to pilot the plane all on your own. But the thing is, with such an advanced autopilot, you never actually learned how to fly the thing. Luckily you do have a guide book, but didn't it look a little different the last time you checked it?

This game was made for the Jamulator 2021 game jam. It was finished on a tight schedule, so expect various bugs and other interesting "features". Also, I never had time to implement sounds, so the onboard entertainment is going to be in your head this time.

If the WebGL embed doesn't want to function, there is a download available for 64-bit systems. Should work on Windows, Mac and Linux, tested only on Windows 10 64-bit.
